"WHO ARE WE?!"
"The Necessary Evil!"
"WHY ARE WE NECESSARY?!"
"To purge the world of evil worse than man!"
"AND WHY ARE WE GOD'S CHOSEN FEW, ORDAINED TO UNDERTAKE THIS UNHOLY TASK?!"
"Because no one else will!"
"AND BECAUSE IT FUCKING FUN!"
*"AAAAAAAAAAAAMEN!!"*
